name: LIGGGHTS_dump
description: Snapshot of a LIGGGHTS simulation containing the (essential) state of a particle simulation

dimensions.name: nParticles
dimensions.description: Number of particles within the simulation

dimensions.name: nProperties
dimensions.description: Number of per-particle properties dumped to the dump file

properties.name: TIMESTEP
properties.description: Time step the snapshot was collected

properties.name: NUMBER OF ATOMS
properties.description: The number of particles within the simulation

properties.name: BOX BOUNDS
properties.description: Boundaries applied in the simulation, as well as bounds of the simulation box

properties.name: ATOMS
properties.description: String containing description of the per-particle properties, array of the per-particle properties
